casebody.data:
No. 558,

Misc.

Stone v. Wyoming ex rel. Guy, Attorney General, et al. J. Norman Stone, John J. Spriggs, Sr. and John J. Spriggs, Jr. for petitioner. George F. Guy, Attorney General, Bruce P. Badley, Assistant Attorney General, and Thurman Arnold for the State of Wyoming, respondent.

Supreme Court of Wyoming. Certiorari denied.
